content: That's a great point about connecting the dots between the workshops. I think I'll start by creating a mind map to visualize the ideas and concepts from each workshop. I've got a bunch of notes and insights scattered across different notebooks and documents, so organizing them in a visual way will help me see the connections more clearly. Since I attended five workshops in the past three months, I'm curious - do you have any suggestions on how to prioritize which insights or takeaways to focus on first, especially if some of them seem more pressing or important than others?
